channel.title: Link or tut for saving char's appearance
channel.description: Ok then...i fixed the beard thingy and i need to know how to make the char's appearance save. I had it in my server but i forgot to make a backup source :\ so if anyone could give me the tut or link to this...it will be appreciated! thanks :]
